DOC.brief_summary: The study ( n = 36 ) parallel design 6 week duration . Participants start 2-week free-living wash-in period ask avoid certain carotenoid-rich food , follow 4 week completely control diet . In addition control diet , participant consume one three beverage ( 300 mL/day ; n = 12/group ) : placebo beverage ( control ) , high beta-carotene tomato juice , high-lycopene tomato juice . Blood , urine feces collect throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Age le 21 great 75 year Glucose > 126 mg/dl Triglycerides > 300 mg/dl Known allergy intolerance tomato tomato product Pregnant , lactating , intend become pregnant study period History bariatric surgery nutrient malabsorption disease ( celiac disease ) metabolic disorder require special diet recommendation Smoker use tobacco product Presently cancer Use certain medication ( prescription overthecounter ) may interfere study objective Type 2 diabetes Use bloodthinning medication Coumadin ( warfarin ) , Dicumarol , Miradon ( anisindione ) Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past 12 month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol
